duties_responsibilities.duty: Coach and develop the sales team to achieve sales targets and KPI goals.
Lead by example in delivering outstanding customer service and meeting customer needs.
Assist in interviewing, on-boarding, and training new hires.
Monitor employee performance and training needs to ensure success and growth.
Ensure accurate inventory management and timely completion of inventory-related tasks.
Attend calls to keep the team up-to-date on changes, operations, and other important information.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business Management, Retail Management, or related field (preferred)
